attributes.action: Cease all International Development Aid to Sudan until certain conditions are met
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current year over £200m in IDA [International Development Aid] has been promised to Sudan.  In light of the continued situation in Darfur and the recent 'Teddy Bear' fiasco; all development aid, trade missions and other economic including export guarantees aid should suspended pending a peace conference and total presidential pardon of Mrs Gillian Gibbons the teacher at the centre of the  'Teddy Bear' conviction.

rejection.details:
Gillian Gibbons has been pardoned.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stopsudanaid/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
